items.title: The Procter & Gamble Company (PG) One of 24 Original Dividend Aristocrats Still in the Index
items.description: The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) is included among the 11 Best Dividend Aristocrat Stocks to Invest in Now. The initial version of the S&P Dividend Aristocrats list was introduced in January 2003, highlighting the S&P companies that had maintained consistent dividend payments for 25 consecutive years. The list gained attention, especially after Microsoft declared [â€¦]
